amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds by the Army Corps of Engineers to award contracts using the lowest price technically acceptable source selection process unless the source selection decision is documented.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds by the Army Corps of Engineers to award contracts using the lowest price technically acceptable source selection process unless the source selection decision is documented.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meadows amendment (A054) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meadows amendment (A054) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A054) offered by Mr. Meadows.
